name: Hand tied per bundle
description:
Available in Indian straight, Brazilian wavy, & Malaysian wavy. 
12-36 inches available 
All bundles are 3.8-4.0 oz. each.
100% Virgin Hair


Indian hair tends to dry into a beautiful wave which ranges from a slight wave to very wavy, although it straightens and curls very easily, and has  mid-high sheen/luster. The hair holds curls very well but they do loosen slightly but will never totally fall out unless you are in a humid or damp environment. It is also thinner in density than the two others and is great for those who want flatter styles.


Malaysian Hair - This hair texture is thicker that Brazilian and is great for someone that wants lots of volume. This hair blends well with medium to coarse hair textures. Malaysian hair holds curls very well withou the use of holding spray. The hair does not requir a lot of heat to straighten due to the density of the hair.

Brazilian hair has a medium density. This hair is slighty coarser in texture than the Indian and Malaysian, but still has a natural shine (low-mid sheen/luster) and beautiful flow. The Straight textures are not bone straight but tend to curl beautifully at the end. This hair holds curls very well and tends to hold curls longer than the Indian Hair. Virgin Brazilian has the premium ability to be worn in its natural state   body wave, straightened, curled (chi-ironed or roller set), and wet-n-wild



All of Legendary's Virgin Hair CAN be dyed!!!

Virgin Hair vs. Non-Virgin Hair

Virgin hair is shinier, softer, more durable 
   and has a longer life than non-virgin hair.

 Virgin means the hair has not  been permed, 
   dyed, colored, bleached or chemically 
   processed in any way. 

 The natural hair color for virgin Indian, 
    Brazilian, and Malaysian virgin hair ranges 
    from very dark to medium brown in color.

 Non-virgin hair has been chemically 
   processed, typically for texture or color.

Non-virgin hair sheds, tangles, and mattes easily
   and has to be replaced more often than virgin
    hair.

name: Machine Weft per bundle
description:
Available in Indian straight, Brazilian natural wave, Malaysian Deep Wave, Peruvian body wave, Cambodian Jerry Curl, & Eurasian straight/natural wave. 
12-36 inches available
All bundles are 3.5 oz each
100%  Virgin Hair

 Indian Hair - Indian hair tends to dry into a beautiful wave which ranges from a slight wave to very wavy, although it straightens and curls very easily, and has  mid-high sheen/luster. The hair holds curls very well but they do loosen slightly but will never totally fall out unless you are in a humid or damp environment. It is also thinner in density than the two others and is great for those who want flatter styles.

Brazilian Hair - Brazilian hair has a medium density. This hair is slighty coarser in texture than the Indian and Malaysian, but still has a natural shine (low-mid sheen/luster) and beautiful flow. The Straight textures are not bone straight but tend to curl beautifully at the end. This hair holds curls very well and tends to hold curls longer than the Indian Hair. 
 
Malaysian Hair - This hair texture is thicker that Brazilian and is great for someone that wants lots of volume. This hair blends well with medium to coarse hair textures. Malaysian hair holds curls very well withou the use of holding spray. The hair does not requir a lot of heat to straighten due to the density of the hair.

Peruvian hair - This hair texture is slightly softer than Brazilian hair. This hair blends very well with African American hair as well as medium  Caucasian hair. Peruvian hair does hold a curl very well and requires high heat to straighten. 

Cambodian hair - This hair texture is lightweight, slightly coarse, very lustrous. This texture is great for relaxed African American hair as well as Thick Hispanic and Caucasian hair. This hair is great for curling or wearing bone straight. 

Eurasian hair - The density of Eurasian hair is verry similar to brazilian hair, however the texture is more defined. Eurasian hair ia  very soft smooth and silky, This hair is great for Hispanic and Caucasian hair, and also comes in 2 shades of blonde 613 & 60 

All bundles are 3.5 oz each in natural black and brown

name: Eurasian per bundle
description:
All bundles are machine weft 3.5 oz each
Available in colors #60 & #613 upon request
100% Virgin Hair

All of Legendary's Virgin Hair CAN be dyed!!!

Eurasian hair - The density of Eurasian hair is verry similar to brazilian hair, however the texture is more defined. Eurasian hair ia  very soft smooth and silky, This hair is great for Hispanic and Caucasian hair, and also comes in 2 shades of blonde 613 & 60
